instructions: Leave kombu-leaves + shiitake mushrooms in 1l of water for 1->8hours
Char bisected onions+shallots on high heat in oil for 3 minutes
Add garlic, ginger, and separate shallot into sheets (leave big onion alone)
Turn on oven for 180 degrees, fan
Once everything is slightly charred, dump water with kombu + shiitake into pan
At 80 degrees, remove shiitake + kombu from pot + add fish-sauce + worchester
Leave to simmer while you make the rest
Prepare mini-cabbages + remove core. Season with oil, salt, pepper, garlic powder
Place cabbages in oven on foil for 20 minutes
Start heating water water for noodles and sprouts (for just before serving)
Sautee cubed portobellos in a skillet with only an eight a cup of water
Once water evaporated, add small amount of oil, then some butter + seasoning
See https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XLPLCmwBLBY for why.
Prepare bean-sprouts, chillies, thai basil
Dump thai basil, green chillies, cloves, and cinnamon into broth
Keep red sliced chillies + half a lime
Remove whole onion from broth (keep shallot sheets)
Finalize broth with soy-sauce, mirin
Quickly heat rice noodles with cleaned sprouts for 30s then dump into bowl
Ladle up broth on top. Top with cabbages and mushrooms on top
Side-bowl with extra chillies, excess bean-sprouts, spring-onions, limes
